Package it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.Board.Player

Class DiningRoom

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.Board.Player.DiningRoom
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DiningRoom extends Object implements Serializable
Class that models the dining room of a player board. It is composed of various tables and can have students added or removed.
See Also:

    • placeStudent

      public boolean placeStudent(Student student) throws FullTableException
      Parameters:
      student - to place in the table of corresponding color
      Throws:
      FullTableException - if the table of the same color of the student is full
      IllegalArgumentException - if the student is already in a table, and the table is not full
